Paper.Title: How to cover a grammar Ren6 Leermakers

Section.SectionTitle: Ren6 Leermakers Philips Research Laboratories, P.O. Box 80.000 5600 JA Eindhoven, The Netherlands ABSTRACT
Section.Paragraph: A novel formalism is presented for Earley-like parsers.
It accommodates the simulation of non-deterministic pushdown automata. In particular, the theory is applied to non-deterministlc LRoparsers for RTN grammars.
